IVI Compliance Category:
-----------------------

IVI-C IviScope Specific Instrument Driver

Class Specification version: 3.00
IVI Generation:
Group Capabilities Supported:

Base= Supported
Interpolation		= Not Supported
TVTrigger		= Supported
RuntTrigger		= Supported
GlitchTrigger		= Supported
WidthTrigger		= Supported
ACLineTrigger		= Supported
WaveformMeasurement	= Supported
MinMaxWaveform		= Supported
ProbeAutoSense		= Supported
ContinuousAcquisition	= Supported
AverageAcquisition	= Supported
SampleMode		= Supported
TriggerModifier		= Supported
AutoSetup		= Supported


Optional Features:
-----------------
Interchangeability Checking	= True
State Caching		 	= True
Coercion Recording 		= True


Driver Identification:
---------------------
Driver Revision:                3.25.49152
Prefix:                      	tkdpo7k
Description:                  	Digital Phosphor Oscilloscope


Driver Release Information:
--------------------------
Original Release Date:         28-DEC-2006
Update Release Date:           08-FEB-2017


Hardware Information:
--------------------
Instrument Manufacturer:      Tektronix

Supported Instrument Models:  DPO7104, DPO7054, DPO7254, DPO7354, DPO70404, DPO70604, DPO70804, DPO71254, DPO71604, DPO72004,
			      DSA70404, DSA70604, DSA70804, DSA71254, DSA71604, DSA72004,
			      MSO70404, MSO70604, MSO70804, MSO71254, MSO71604, MSO72004, MSO5034, MSO5054, MSO5104, MSO5204,
			      DPO5034, DPO5054, DPO5104, DPO5204
Supported Bus Interfaces:     Ethernet, IEEE488, USB


32-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows 7 (32-bit), Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (32-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit)
                                          Windows 10 (32-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available


64-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
Unsupported Operation Systems:            N/A
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available

Unit Testing
--------------------
Test Setup 1:

Instrument Model (Firmware Revision):
Bus Interface:
Operating System (Service Pack):
OS Bitness/Application Bitness:
VISA Vendor and Version:
IVI Shared Components Version:


Driver Installation Testing:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):
OS Bitness:


Driver Buildability:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):
OS Bitness:

Driver Test Failures:
--------------------
Known Issues:  		Although all trigger functions are implemented in the driver, not all of them have been tested with the live instrument.
The functions that haven't been tested are:
    tkdpo7k_ConfigureTrigger (we only test the Edge trigger type of this function)
    tkdpo7k_ConfigureSPITriggerData
    tkdpo7k_ConfigureSPITriggerMISO
    tkdpo7k_ConfigureSPITriggerMOSI
    tkdpo7k_ConfigureSPITriggerSCLK
    tkdpo7k_ConfigureSPITriggerSource
    tkdpo7k_ConfigureSPITriggerSS
